description: The oldest known version of the Holy Family, hung in a town planning office, was thought a copy.
title: Jacques Jordaens: Baroque masterpiece found in Brussels town hall
title_page: Jacques Jordaens: Baroque masterpiece found in Brussels town hall - BBC News
maintext: Joost Vander Auwera, senior curator at the Royal Museums of Fine Arts of Belgium, said the discovery not only enabled "precise dating" of Jordaens' early works but also "provides a better understanding of the material genesis of the later versions" of the painting.
